questions.question: What is the maximum amount that ArkLeap will reimburse without a receipt?
questions.explanation: According to the content, ArkLeap will not reimburse expenditure greater than 50 EGP without a receipt.

source.context:
ArkLeap Technolgies
 Expense Report
ArkLeap regulations require that traveling personnel maintain an adequate record for 
each trip and post all pertinent information in support of each expenditure (who, what, 
why, when and how much). All Expense Reports must be approved by the employee’s 
Manager in accordance with the Supervisor/Manager’s expenditure authorization. Expense reports must be submitted to the Finance Department monthly and last month`s 
report could be upon return or maximum within five (5) days of the first expenditure 
incurred or reimbursement can be delayed while current reports are processed. S Employee’s Responsibilities
s Exception approval is required if employee business expenses are not clearly in 
accordance with policy. Any of these conditions require exception approval
 Unusual expense
« Expense could possibly appear to be inappropriate
ª Expense exceeds the guidelines
| Expense reports not submitted in a timely manner
z Photocopy/inadequate/missing receipt. s Approving manager may not be a direct 
or indirect, beneficiary of the expense 
being 
approved. For 
example, 
an 
expense report for business meetings 
must be approved by the next highest 
level of management not in attendance
s Receipts are required for reimbursement 
of all authorized business expenses. The 
receipt must identify the name of the 
establishment, 
date, 
actual 
amount 
incurred, description, and receipt of 
payment.

questions.question: What is the per diem travel allowance for an ArkLeap employee?
questions.explanation: According to the content, the traveler will have 50$ per diem as travel allowance.

questions.question: What is the maximum cash advance an ArkLeap employee can receive per trip?
questions.explanation: According to the content, a cash advance of up to 1000$ per trip will be given to the traveler to cover his living expenses.

questions.question: Who should approve an employee's expense report at ArkLeap?
questions.explanation: According to the content, all Expense Reports must be approved by the employee’s Manager in accordance with the Supervisor/Manager’s expenditure authorization.

questions.question: What is the maximum layover time allowed for Lowest Fare Routing (LFR) in ArkLeap?
questions.explanation: According to the content, Lowest Fare Routing (LFR) should result in total layover time not exceeding 4 hours.
